intro:
"Falling in Love with the Man You Dislike?!
Experience a thrilling office romance in this exciting Love game!"
description:
A Dark Past, Trauma... and an Unexpected Love?
The heroine is struggling with mental health issues caused by painful memories and a troubled past. She regularly visits the hospital for treatment.

While working alongside a clumsy junior colleague, Makoto Minase, she tries to navigate her difficult workplace... but the pressure from both him and her surroundings becomes too much. She finally decides to confront the company president — only to discover that it’s none other than Raiki Kiryuu, the very same boy who used to bully her in the past.

As if things couldn't get any worse, her parents suddenly push her into an arranged marriage. Reluctantly agreeing to meet the suitor, she’s shocked to see Selene Irie, a wealthy heir who used to stalk her as a child...

A Thrilling Office Romance Otome Game
Part of a larger series, but can be enjoyed as a standalone!

18 unique love interests await you!

This title features 3 main characters to pursue in this chapter.

Includes a CG Gallery and Sound Room

All original BGM

Fully voiced in Japanese

Features 15 CGs (5 per character) in a visual novel slideshow format — no character sprites.

The opening and ending themes are sung by the voice actors!
